title: EU-Balkans Summit must avert a looming refugee disaster as winter nears (Amnesty International USA)
text: ( Source : Amnesty International USA ) Leaders from states along the main refugee route through the Balkans and Central Europe cannot walk out of yet another meeting in Brussels on Sunday without a workable plan of action that protects
